thread.title: LAKE ELSINORE: Workshop targets potential entrepreneurs
thread.title_full: LAKE ELSINORE: Workshop targets potential entrepreneurs - Press Enterprise

author: MICHAEL J. WILLIAMS
title: LAKE ELSINORE: Workshop targets potential entrepreneurs
text:
BY MICHAEL J. WILLIAMS / STAFF WRITER
Published: Oct. 13, 2015 1:39 p.m. LAKE ELSINORE: Workshop targets potential entrepreneurs Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT The Diamond Club in the Lake Elsinore Diamond stadium will be the site of a chamber of commerce workshop Thursday, Oct. 15. FILE PHOTO Related article » Franchise ownership is the topic of a workshop that will be held by the Lake Elsinore Valley Chamber of Commerce on Thursday, Oct. 15.
The event is scheduled from 11:30 a.m. to 1:30 p.m. in the club at The Diamond stadium, 500 Diamond Drive, in Lake Elsinore.
Admission to the workshop costs $15 and reservations can be made by contacting Michelle Simon with the chamber at 951-245-8848 or michelle@lakeelsinorechamber.com. The chamber’s website can be viewed at lakeelsinorechamber.com .
The purpose of the workshop is to educate those interested in becoming a franchisee how to go about it and to link them with businesses who offer franchise opportunities.
Contact the writer: 951-368-9690 or michaelwilliams@pe.com
